### Heatmap with Annotations

```{r}
library(plotly)

n=250
t=12
x = c(rep(0:(n-1), times=t))
y = c(rep(0:(t-1), each=n))
z = matrix(data=sample.int(n=10, size=n*t, replace=TRUE), ncol=n)
text = c(replicate(t*n, sample(c("A","T","G","C"), 1)))

steps = list()
for (e in c(0:(n-30))){
  step <- list(
    list(
      args = list('xaxis.range', c(-0.5 + e, 30.5 + e)),
      method = "relayout",
      label = e,
      value = e
    )
  )
  steps[e] <- step
}

p <- plot_ly() %>%
  add_trace(
    type='heatmap',
    z = z
  ) %>%
  add_trace(
    mode = "text",
    text = text,
    type = "scattergl",
    textfont = list(
      size = 20
    ),
    x = x,
    y = y
  ) %>%
  layout(
    xaxis = list(
      range = c(-0.5, 30.5),
      showline = F,
      zeroline = F,
      showgrid = F
    ),
    yaxis = list(
      showline = F,
      zeroline = F,
      showgrid = F
    ),
    sliders=list(
      list(
        active = 0,
        steps = steps
      )
    )
  )

p
```
